name: brizzles underground guided tour
description: If graffiti is your thing my tour includes a visit to some underground paint/clothes shops and art galleries. Also some of the prime painting sites for those on the local Bristol scene.Both those in plan site and more hidden. Also some legal stops if you wish to make your mark on the city. The arts tour will continue as the music tour begins you will visit some bars which most tourists simply miss and some of the hot spots for lots of up and coming music talent. Once the tour is complete, you will know how to speak like a local have a camera packed full of underground art picks. know where to go depending on what kind music and night life suits you.
